tool_description: Download and stream Seasonal movies and full movies without buffering, from the official company of Disney Inc.
name: Disney worlds
title: Disney worlds

api_list.name: seasonal movies
api_list.description: Get a full list of all seasonal movies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://disney-worlds.p.rapidapi.com/seasonalmovies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "disney-worlds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
